title: Motion of balloon relative to the ground

content.prompt: A balloon of mass M is floating motionless in the air. A person of mass less than M is on a rope ladder hanging from the balloon. The person begins to climb the ladder at a uniform speed v relative to the ground. How does the balloon move relative to the ground?

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
